title: Research Program Management: Funding Geo Sciences--My Work as DFG Program Director | Science | AAAS
snippet: To keep them motivated requires a further skill: Cooperative team leadership. That is not always easy! And there are some negative points: You will not accumulate riches in this type of job, and career opportunities are very limited. On the other hand, the work I do is independent to a high degree because DFG has an extremely flat structure.
